attributes.action: Make food producers and retailers state on packaging if their food is Halal
attributes.additional_details: Halal foods are being forced upon us, in supermarkets, major fast food chains and in schools. These foods are not marked up as halal. We want the government to make producers and retailers of food and beverages mark up their products with the halal logo so people can see what they are buying and choose wether to or not.
